document.full_text: with sidney crosby revealing friday that he had to curtail his light skating because of the return of concussion symptoms, the question of head trauma in hockey was thrown back into the spotlight.
document.title: alumni group has plan to track brain health of former players
lines_and_colors: with sidney crosby revealing friday that he had to curtail his light skating because of the return of concussion symptoms, the question of head trauma in hockey was thrown back into the spotlight.
